results.title: Product Manager
results.description:
Transifex is a Greek-born company, internationally recognized by todayâ€™s tech leaders as a leading agile translation management solution. With offices in the US and Greece, we are global and digital â€” with employees on two continents and customers in nearly 50 countries representing about 60,000 projects and over 500,000 users, localizing content in 150+ languages. Companies like Quora, Atlassian, Eventbrite, Meetup, and HubSpot rely on Transifex to achieve a truly multilingual, global presence.

Our mission at Transifex is to allow every person in the world to use technology in their native language. We want to become the default platform for product teams to manage their localization in a continuous way, one which blends well with their product development tools and workflows.

Transifex believes that diversity enhances the ability to deliver our first class software services. Our workplace is discrimination-free and we are committed to ensuring equal employment opportunities. Our belief is that diversity of background, experience and perspectives promotes both a better environment for our employees and a better user/customer platform. These are key values we trust in and we invite all qualified applicants to join the #remotefirst world of Transifex.

While considering this position, take into account what we value here at Transifex. We are looking for someone who aims to:

  • Be a true teammate
  • Consistently grow
  • Advocate for the Customer
  • Truly own it
  • Be your whole self

The Role

As a Product Manager at Transifex, you will have a big impact on shaping product direction and consecutively on the success of our product. You will be a catalyst for reaching optimal solutions and syncing on expectations across departments. You will help our team focus on whatâ€™s important and youâ€™ll be a problem solver for our customers. After all, you will push Transifex even further and help us realize our mission to break down language barriers by making localization accessible to everyone. If these sound like challenges you are up to take, we would love to hear from you.

Â 

Responsibilities

  • Shape and coordinate the execution of product roadmap based on internal stakeholder and customer feedback.
  • Create clear and comprehensive product specs in a way that can be communicated to internal and external stakeholders.
  • Be responsible for product releases and ensure the delivery of a short-term roadmap.
  • Perform analysis of customer needs and prioritize the product backlog accordingly.
  • Be a champion of Agile values and principles.
  • Build bridges and help to improve communications across team members and departments.
  • Coordinate, facilitate, and motivate your engineering team to deliver their goals.
  • Have the overview of a feature life-cycle and take action to make it happen, e.g. by organizing releases between departments, monitoring KPIs, and iterating after release.
  • Be a strategy-minded leader who will gain insights into the localization industry, market, and competitors and have an eye on identifying market opportunities.
  • Be a Transifex promoter

Requirements

  • We will only proceed with applicants based in between GMT and GMT+4 timezones (2-hour difference from Greek time)
  • 3+ years of professional experience in a technical environment. Experience in SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) or startups is a plus.
  • Excellent communication skills in English
  • Top-notch communication skills. This role is pivotal to the effective flow of communication across different teams in the organization.
  • Great organisational and project management skills.
  • Experience in analyzing data from various data-gathering resources (GA, Mixpanel, DB-SQL). You should love data and data analytics, data visualization, SQL, and dashboard design.
  • Ability to see and articulate the connections between small backlog items and the big strategic business goals.
  • Experience with agile development methodologies.

More about the team

Our Product team at Transifex is responsible for our whole product development, from translating our vision and ideas, researching and iterating over solutions, and, eventually, tracking the success of each step of our product with key performance indicators. We sit in the middle of major functions in our company and act as the glue to make our product reach its full potential. We work closely with Engineering and deeply understand that it's not only about doing the project right, but also doing the right project. We leave and breathe user needs, metrics, testing, and making our users love our product.

Benefits

results.description:

Â 
Â 
Â

Some of the topics you could help us with:
  • How to deliver value to our open-source users without degrading the intuitiveness and ease of use when it comes to solving complex business needs such as high availability, scaling, observability and security?
  • How to scale our product feedback management process as our monthly active user base continues to grow and input channels increase? For example, every repository issue or any conversation within our community can be an interesting feedback to collect, process and share.

Â 
  • Please send us your resume and a quick note of why you might be a good fit for this job. Don't hesitate to have a look at our LinkedIn page, as well as our Meet the Team page.

Why you'll enjoy working with us

- We are open to fully remote applications, as long as you are between GMT-4 and GMT+5 time zones,

- Access to a mental health platform (moka.care) + 4 sessions with a coach/trained therapist,

Â 
Meilisearch is an equal opportunity employer. We strive to develop an inclusive work environment that reflects the diversity of our open-source community.
